Method Detail

getGlobalConverter

Converter getGlobalConverter()
The adapter can define it's global converter to customize the data conversion.

Returns:
Get the current converter used to convert data in component to data in the model

setGlobalConverter

void setGlobalConverter(Converter converter)
Modify the current global converter used to convert data in component in order to update the model

setComponentModel

void setComponentModel(java.lang.Object component,
                       java.lang.Class<? extends ModelComponent> customizedModelComponent)
For each Component supported, this method must set an instance of customized ModelComponent to define the binding rules between a component and it's property name in the associated model. if the component class is not supported than throw an IllegalArgumentException

Parameters:
componentKlass - the component class
customizedModelComponent - the model component class
